Package rpg.charactercreation.data

Interface Character

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterClass, Dwarf, Elf, Human, Mage, Race, Rogue, Warrior
    public interface Character
    Interface for the various aspects of a Character.

    This is an Interface containing getters for the Character Objects's Stamina, Health, HitChance and Defense modifiers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getDefenseModifier()
      getter method for defense modifier of Character aspects.
      int getHealthModifier()
      getter method for health modifier of Charcater aspects.
      int getHitChanceModifier()
      getter method for hit chance modifier of Character aspects.
      int getStaminaModifier()
      getter method for stamina modifier of character aspects.
